post.body: yeah, our church was canceled too, which is sad cuz one of my kids was taking protection of faith and getting baptized! bummer!
what's in Hungary? I was just told I'm moving there in 8 months.
actually, it's for long term missions in Hungary. know anything about Hungary? me neither, but i might be moving there...
I'm waiting until 3p to cancel CHAOS. Apparently the roads are bad and not going to get better, but it just means two weeks off. bummer!
I'm happy that there's going to be a New Years Eve party at my place after-all!
I'm home and annoyed at the choices of programs on TV. Grrr...
I am wishing I were at home, curled up in front of a fire place with a good book and a cup of hot cider. * le sigh *
I really want to have my New Years Eve party - just gotta convince my roommates... ugh.
working hard and decorating wayne's office - muahahaha!
bathroom first coat is FINALLY done. FINALLY!
coffee. coffecoffeecoffeecoffeecoffee. brew fasta
home, in my fleece pajama pants, wondering what life will be like in a year...
I am wrapping 42 gifts for youth group tomorrow night... will that be enough? It's been our average number, so I'm hoping... hmmm...
I was too excited to sleep. whatever. there will be time to sleep in Heaven, I hope. Dear Jesus, come again soon. Love, Trazy
I'm so psyched about Hungary. I'm too excited to sleep. I just want to go now! Well I don't want to say goodbye to you yet, but want to go!
my entire future rests on today's interview with the RCA Global Missions. No pressure or anything! - everyone, please pray for me at 3:30!
formal interview tomorrow - half scared, half excited, half nervous, half apathetic, half feeling strange... wait, that's too many halves!!!
today: make coffee, organize CHAOS Jr Rooms, clean CHAOS room, setup powerpoints, write in Bibles, bulletin boards, bible studies, maybe nap
waking up, but wishing I could sleep all day...
